value.title: Microsoft CEO responds to AI-generated Taylor Swift fake nude images
value.excerpt: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella said Friday that the company has to “move fast” on combatting nonconsensual sexually explicit deepfake images, after AI-generated fake nude pictures of Taylor Swift went viral this week.

value.title: ChatGPT effect: Coursera sees signups for AI courses every minute in 2023
value.excerpt: US edutech platform Coursera added a new user every minute on average for its artificial intelligence courses in 2023, CEO Jeff Maggioncalda said on Thursday, in a clear sign of people upskilling to tap a potential boom in generative AI.

value.title: Your Child’s Next Playmate Could Be An AI Toy Powered By ChatGPT

value.title: Microsoft Releases Free AI 'Choose Your Own Adventure' Reading Coach
value.excerpt: Microsoft's latest AI is a Reading Coach that creates stories on the fly and helps students read them. The AI will listen to pronunciations and give feedback, among other things.
